entries.description: auth: IAM Identity Center connections expire sooner than expected
CodeWhisperer: user is sometimes required to re-login before token expiration
Add fallback to local cached files for Step Function Visualizations where host doesn't have internet.
Update dependency amazon-states-language-service from 1.9->1.10. This fixes  support for Yaml Comments in states machines, ProcessorConfig property & Credentials key.
CodeWhisperer: Requested operation is not recognized by the service when fetching recommendations
CodeWhisperer sometimes add extra space at the beginning of suggestion
CodeWhisperer no longer trigger suggestions on IntelliSense acceptance
